body: So I'm having my wisdom teeth removed tomorrow and I was just wondering if you have any general suggestions for movies that I should watch? I'm sure that we could all share our favorites and maybe we can all find a new movie to watch. So any suggestions?
body_tagged: So I'm having my wisdom teeth removed tomorrow and I was just wondering if you have any general suggestions for movies that I should watch? I'm sure that we could all share our favorites and maybe we can all find a new movie to watch. So any suggestions?
title: Movie Suggestions?

replies.body: movies????? watch animes
replies.body_tagged: movies????? watch animes

replies.body:
Froz- Oh wait a minute...

I don't watch many movies, however I did like Big Hero 6, so if you haven't seen that I recommend that.

That's all I got tho. Unless you want me to suggest Froz-

I'll stop.

replies.body:
Dumb and dumber To (two) 
its a funny movie, not sure if you would want to laugh or not though.

-Sponge out of water
it is a movie for littler kids but it's good.

-Big hero 6
I loved this movie it's EXTREAMLY good. 

-Happy Gilmore 
its about a hockey player that turns into a funy golf player to save his grammas house (Adam sanders in it)

and if your ok with 18+ bad teacher is a good one
its a teacher who wants bigger (•)(•) and goes threw ALOT even if you don't watch it Google bad teacher toilet scene it's hilarious!

replies.body: Movies??? Who watches those anymore? YouTube is where it's at!
replies.body_tagged: Movies??? Who watches those anymore? YouTube is where it's at!

replies.body:
I hope you like war movies.

Schindler's List
Saving Private Ryan
Captain Phillips

Also, try a few of these
A Walk Among The Tombstones
Interstellar

For laughs:
The Other Guys
The Guilt Trip

Enjoy, and good luck with your wisdom teeth. Any work on your teeth is gruelling ._.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I'm into war movies of any kind, so here's a few I recommend.

-Lone Survivor
-Fury
-American Sniper

Aside from that, there are a few others I quite enjoyed.

-Flight
-Neighbors
-The Notebook (judge me, I'm a softie. I watched it a while ago, and it was fantastic.)

Hope this helped buddy, and good luck getting those wisdom teeth out! 

<3

replies.body:
Alright guys you have given me some great ideas!!! I've settled on a couple of them and hopefully I can come back with a report on what I watched! If you want you can always keep requesting movies, because hopefully this list will be able help others find movies. 

Anyways thanks again for the recommendations and I hope to be able to get through as many as I can.

replies.body:
If you like intense action, watch:
  • Jason Bourne (any of the 4)
  • James Bond (my favorite one is casino royale)
  • Taken 1,2,3
If you like to laugh, watch: 
  • The Water boy
  • Dumb and Dumber 1 or 2 (1 is the better one in my opinion)
  • Mrs. Doubt fire (I swear, it looks corny, but it is funny as hell)
If you are into just really good/inspiring/dramatic movies, i recommend:
  • The Butler 
  • The One Hundred Foot Journey
  • Gravity
replies.body_tagged:
If you like intense action, watch:
  • Jason Bourne (any of the 4)
  • James Bond (my favorite one is casino royale)
  • Taken 1,2,3
If you like to laugh, watch: 
  • The Water boy
  • Dumb and Dumber 1 or 2 (1 is the better one in my opinion)
  • Mrs. Doubt fire (I swear, it looks corny, but it is funny as hell)
If you are into just really good/inspiring/dramatic movies, i recommend:
  • The Butler 
  • The One Hundred Foot Journey
  • Gravity

replies.body: Alright guys just got my teeth out and I'm gonna watch a movie. Which one should I watch?!?
replies.body_tagged: Alright guys just got my teeth out and I'm gonna watch a movie. Which one should I watch?!?

replies.body:
Once again thank ks for the kind words, I'm doing great surgery went better than expected, and I still can't feel my tongue, but other than that I'm great!

Funny things that happened:

I called my doctor flat or fat my mom says she could tell what I was saying

Slapped a nurse

Yelled at a little kid laughing at me

Called my grandma old

Broke a glass by me feeling nauseous

Other than that it went great!
replies.body_tagged:
Once again thank ks for the kind words, I'm doing great surgery went better than expected, and I still can't feel my tongue, but other than that I'm great!

Yelled at a little kid laughing at me

Other than that it went great!
